summary: UK YouTubers Announced for VidCon 2019 – TenEighty — YouTube News, Features, and Interviews
title: UK YouTubers Announced for VidCon 2019 – TenEighty — YouTube News, Features, and Interviews
description:
VidCon US will be holding its 10th annual event from 10-13 July in Anaheim, California, and will feature meet and greets, concerts, panels, an expo hall with booths and activities, and much more.

Numerous online creators have already been announced as attending the event, including many UK YouTubers. Those attending thus far include Charlie McDonnell, Sean McLoughlin, Phil Lester, Daniel Howell, LDShadowLady, Joel SmallishBeans and Saffron Barker.

This year’s VidCon will see the filming of the new original series, VidCon Now, with Dan and Phil being the first Featured Creators to take part. The series, which will be filmed throughout the duration of the event, will be uploaded across VidCon’s social channels, including Snapchat, Facebook and Instagram.

Organisers have also announced the extension of the 2019 Meet & Greet Lottery, meaning those wishing to enter for a chance to meet their favourite creators can send in their submissions until 9 June. Winners will receive their confirmations, as well as instructions, on 14 June.

Dan & Phil will be hosting a Meet & Greet at #VidConUS and the Meet & Greet Lottery has been extended until Sunday, 6/9!  If you already entered, you can modify your selections now to include them in your top 15. The lottery results will be made available on Friday, 6/14.

Those wishing to attend VidCon 2019 can choose from three different tracks: Community, Creator and Industry. Details regarding each track, as well as ticket information, can be found via the event’s official website.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: 3k-5k Words Fics (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

Be Alright - yiffandquiff

Summary: There is a darker side behind the hiatus and the ending of Dan and Phil games…one that Dan and Phil never showed.

‘Cause I Want What I Want, But With You It’s What I Need (ao3) - t_hens

Summary: Phil had one rule: don’t think of Dan, but that’s hard to do when they bump into each other three years after Dan left.

Dil Howlter - helloanonymouswriter

Summary: Phil is pushed into parenthood by a woman who claims he’s the father and Dan and Phil have to look after 12 year old Dil. Two years later Dil wants to get his dad and Dan together because it’s completely obvious they like each other.

Fairy Lights - omgdatphantho

Summary: Dan and Phil have sex for the first time under fairy lights. How cliche?

Fluidity (ao3) - dizzy, waveydnp

Summary: Sometimes they want to stay in.

Giving Everything We Have (ao3) - parentaladvisorybullshitcontent

Summary: “We have a bus,” Phil says.

Dan grins at him.

“Nerd,” He says, fondly.

In which they have a tour bus for the US leg of TATINOF and Dan has a space in his bunk with Phil’s name on it.

How To Fall in Love with Dan Howell - phangirlingforphan

Summary: “Hey Dan, I’ve got this date tomorrow night and I really don’t want to screw it up, so would you mind going on a fake date with me so I can test my moves out?”

I Really Can’t Tell If I’m Dreaming Or Breathing - wavydanrises

Summary: Dan is an events manager at the Queen’s Garden’s, one of the city’s most renowned hotels, and he’s organizing a Christmas reception with the cute reception planner called Phil Lester.

It’s Different In The Dark - howthemoonsuitsthenightsky

Summary: When a leaflet for a haunted house comes through the door, Phil really wants to go, but Dan is less keen.

I Want To Be There (So You Don’t Have To Be Brave) - phloridas

Summary: There were days (so many of them) where Dan would give anything to be by Phil’s side, proving himself time and again as Phil’s knight in shining armor. Little did he know, that time may be coming sooner than he thinks.

Just Breathe Now - freetheknee

Summary: Suddenly he realizes Phil is next to him, arm around his back, holding him upright and checking his temperature by pressing his palm against his cheek.
“Phil?” He whispered, once he found the breath and presence of mind to speak.
“Hey, baby. I’m here, just breathe.”
(Dan comes down with the stomach flu in the middle of the night. Phil cares for him.)

Lucky (ao3) - iihappydaysii

Summary: After The Last Jedi premiere, Dan and Phil have trouble keeping their hands off each other.

Lucky Charms (ao3) - howdoesonewrite

Summary: Dan is a serial kill who is supposed to kill Phil’s dad but something goes wrong and now Dan’s stuck with a small Phil.

Normalness Leads to Sadness - succubusphan

Summary: Ten year old Phil makes a new friend during his family holidays and his life changes forever.

Rockabye Ruby (ao3) - watergator

Summary: Dan thinks their daughter is seeing a ghost.

Room 311 - placingglaciers

Summary: They think he’s in love with the girl, but in reality, he’s in love with the guy.

S.O.S … In 5 Minutes - helloanonymouswriter

Summary: Dan and Phil used to be friends but then Dan became a player. They are paired together on a camping trip only to be left behind on their own and wait for staff to return. A little bit of smut.

The Silver Lining (ao3) - croissantbleu

Summary: Phil is a rising actor, gaining popularity. Dan is just a guy with a tailor shop just a few blocks away from Phil’s apartment. And Phil was looking for someone to go to for custom suits, but maybe he’ll end up with more than he had thought.

The Worst Kind of Friendship Bracelets (ao3) - Emptylester (timelordangel)

Summary: Dan and Phil accidentally handcuff themselves together, shenanigans and important conversations ensue.

You Forced My Hand - xinyanhowell

Summary: Dan and Phil are Jedi apprentices at the Academy. Things get… interesting when a training duel gets out of hand…

reblog.comment:
part one, part two

Summary: There were days (so many of them) where Dan would give anything to be by Phil’s side, proving himself time and again as Phil’s knight in shining armor. Little did he know, that time may be coming sooner than he thinks.

Just Breathe Now - freetheknee

Summary: Suddenly he realizes Phil is next to him, arm around his back, holding him upright and checking his temperature by pressing his palm against his cheek.
“Phil?” He whispered, once he found the breath and presence of mind to speak.
“Hey, baby. I’m here, just breathe.”
(Dan comes down with the stomach flu in the middle of the night. Phil cares for him.)

Lucky (ao3) - iihappydaysii

Summary: After The Last Jedi premiere, Dan and Phil have trouble keeping their hands off each other.

Lucky Charms (ao3) - howdoesonewrite

Summary: Dan is a serial kill who is supposed to kill Phil’s dad but something goes wrong and now Dan’s stuck with a small Phil.

Normalness Leads to Sadness - succubusphan

Summary: Ten year old Phil makes a new friend during his family holidays and his life changes forever.

Rockabye Ruby (ao3) - watergator

Summary: Dan thinks their daughter is seeing a ghost.

Room 311 - placingglaciers

Summary: They think he’s in love with the girl, but in reality, he’s in love with the guy.

S.O.S … In 5 Minutes - helloanonymouswriter

Summary: Dan and Phil used to be friends but then Dan became a player. They are paired together on a camping trip only to be left behind on their own and wait for staff to return. A little bit of smut.

The Silver Lining (ao3) - croissantbleu

Summary: Phil is a rising actor, gaining popularity. Dan is just a guy with a tailor shop just a few blocks away from Phil’s apartment. And Phil was looking for someone to go to for custom suits, but maybe he’ll end up with more than he had thought.

The Worst Kind of Friendship Bracelets (ao3) - Emptylester (timelordangel)

Summary: Dan and Phil accidentally handcuff themselves together, shenanigans and important conversations ensue.

You Forced My Hand - xinyanhowell

Summary: Dan and Phil are Jedi apprentices at the Academy. Things get… interesting when a training duel gets out of hand…

 ✧

summary: Writers please add trigger warnings and tags when your phanfiction includes non-consensual acts, other forms of violence, mental...
body:
Writers please add trigger warnings and tags when your phanfiction includes non-consensual acts, other forms of violence, mental illness, etc.

And to people who reblog phanfictions, please tag triggers as well. If you haven’t read the fic, please at least attempt to tag triggers. Please.

I’m not telling you to do anything. I’m simply asking. I know tagging triggers on reblogs is semi “controversial” here but honestly it doesn’t hurt to add tags and it can really help people who maybe struggling.
